titleStmt.title: A letter to a dissenter, upon occasion of His Majesties late gracious declaration of indulgence
titleStmt.author: Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695.

notesStmt.note: Signed: T.W. [i.e. The Writer, George Savile] Cf. DNB and BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
